text: Comics! was a Canadian television series, which aired on CBC Television in the 1990s. A half-hour standup comedy series, the show focused on one Canadian comedian each week. The series was produced by Joe BodolaiDigital Spy and Sandra Faire. ==References== ==External links== * Category:CBC Television original programming Category:1993 Canadian television series debuts Category:1999 Canadian television series endings Category:1990s Canadian comedy television series
title: Comics!
